quotes.quote: Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it.
Nobody lives without making mistakes.
Nobody gets through life without experiencing some form of rejection, which is why everybody knows how awful it feels.
Nothing can bring you peace but yourself. Nothing can bring you peace but the triumph of principles.
Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies
Nobody should pin their hopes on a miracle.
Nobody got anywhere in the world by simply being content.
Nobody speaks the truth when there is something they must have.
Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
Nobody's perfect. Even the most successful people make serious mistakes.
If nobody recognizes you, if nobody cares, it's easier to avoid getting carried away. That's way harder if you're a famous artist.
Nobody owes anybody a living, but everybody is entitled to a chance.
Nobody ever did, or ever will, escape the consequences of his choices.
Nobody gets lucky all the time. Nobody can win all the time. Nobody's a robot. Nobody's perfect.
Nobody minds having what is too good for them.
Nobody is bored when he is trying to make something that is beautiful, or to discover something that is true.
Nobody understands another's sorrow, and nobody another's joy.
Nobody's life is ever all balanced. It's a conscious decision to choose your priorities every day.
Nobody is perfect, but life is about choices.
Nobody is a villain in their own story. We're all the heroes of our own stories.
Nobody can dare me to do anything that I don't come up with on my own.
Nobody can defeat you when you all are working together.
Nobody is as powerful as we make them out to be.
Nobody deserves your tears, but whoever deserves them will not make you cry.
Nobody really knows everything, and they can only assume.
Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
No one got anywhere by being too scared to open their mouth in case nobody laughed.
Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
Nobody can ever pin you down when you speculate.
Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
